game_description: Throwing Punches is a boxing game where you can punch your opponents from a distance. Throw your punches and control them in flight while dodging enemy attacks. It can be a real workout! You can slow down time if the situation gets out of control. Go through 12 levels consisting of 4 stages each as fast as you can to stand at the top of the leaderboards! Test yourself in Endless Random mode - whether you clear the stage or not - you never know what comes next! Experiment with modifiers - make your fists go faster, disable gravity, or change the slow motion controls! Now with three ways to control slow motion: manual, "if you move, time moves" and "time slows down when bullets are nearby"
